track.videotitle: How To Play Viva La Vida By Coldplay On Guitar
track.description:
How to do the Steve Martin dance: http://bitly.com/stevemartindance http://www.mahalo.com/how-to-play-viva-la-vida-by-coldplay-on-guitar Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/MahaloGuitar
Do you want to know how to play a really popularColdplay song? This page is your resource to learn how to play Viva la Vida by Coldplay on guitar. Video instruction provided by your guide Jen will make learning the chord progressions easy. Before beginning, you may want to read up on how to play guitar for newbies. After you have assimilated a bit of guitar knowledge you will be ready to jump in and learn how to play Viva la Vida. Jen gives you a chord-by-chord breakdown on the guitar of the song "Viva La Vida"by Coldplay.
Check out these related Mahalo pages: How to Play Clocks by Coldplay on Guitar : http://www.mahalo.com/how-to-play-clocks-by-coldplay-on-guitar How to Play Fix You by Coldplay on Guitar :...

track.videotitle: How to Two-Step in Hip Hop Dance
track.description:
There are multiple different types of two step in hip hop dance, including the basic, double, four corners, stepping out and the type you learned in the Find the Beat lesson. 
Basic Two Step
1. Start with your feet touching. Step to your right with your right foot, then bring your left foot over to meet it. Step to your left with your left foot, then bring your right foot over to meet it.
2. Repeat step one.
Double Two Step
1. Start with your feet touching. Step to your right with your right foot, then bring it back in to your left foot. Step to your right with your right foot again, then bring your left foot over to meet it.
2. Step to your left with your left foot, then bring it back in to your right foot. Step to your left with your left foot again, then bring your right foot over to meet it.
3. Repeat steps one and two.
Four Corners
1. Step forward and to your right with your right foot. Step forward and to your left with your left...

TRACKLIST
01.Intro 02.Dime quien me reta 03.Persona oscura 04.Algo me dice 05.Levantad el puño 06.N.W.O. 07.Somos reyes 08.Sendas de la nueva era 09.El movimiento 10.Mi leyenda 11.Enemigo del señor 12.Que es el hip hop

track.videotitle: Learn 2 solo lead blues rock guitar major pentatonic scales
track.description:
http://www.nextlevelguitar.com/offers/blues_rock_offer/
Click the above link to check out our 4 DVD set "Beginner Blues Rock Soloing" - it has over 8 hours of video lessons, jam tracks, and a coinciding written lesson booklet.
This lesson is a small part of a much longer lesson in the above 4 dvd set where we teach you how to use the major pentatonic scale in blues rock guitar playing - this is the 1st of two parts in this series.
Many more lessons on the full on video instructional website at: http://www.nextlevelguitar.com

track.videotitle: With a Little Help from My Friends - Easy Guitar Lesson
track.description: http://www.rhythmstrummer.com/lesson-preview.php?products_id=92 One of 30 full song lessons available + over 100 techniques. We are doing it all with legal licenses, so that's why our free stuff is brief. We teach guitar for beginners. Come on down to the site for more music, fun, and education. Don't worry, we'll practice WITH you. ;)
